data.eml:eml: Two new Peripatopsis species (Onychophora: Peripatopsidae) from the Western Cape province, South Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article E, Dane, Ruhberg, Hilke, Daniels, Savel R. (2012): Two new Peripatopsis species (Onychophora: Peripatopsidae) from the Western Cape province, South Africa. Zootaxa 3380: 55-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.211469
